plot: A baby Swift fell in my office's balcony. Taking care of it brought up feelings and sensations I thought I had forgotten.
title: Mi semana con Cosme
plot_es: A baby Swift fell in my office's balcony. Taking care of it brought up feelings and sensations I thought I had forgotten.
plot_en: A baby Swift fell in my office's balcony. Taking care of it brought up feelings and sensations I thought I had forgotten.
